articles.description: Watch live coverage from day two of Wimbledon, featuring top seed Jannik Sinner, British number one Jack Draper and French Open winner Coco Gauff.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Watson vs Tauson, Monday vs Paul on day two - watch stream, order of play, scores & updates

articles.description: Saudi Arabia have spent billions in bidding to become a world football force - and in beating Manchester City at the Club World Cup, "climbed Mount Everest without oxygen" according to their manager.
articles.title: Club World Cup 2025: Al-Hilal 'climb Everest' but worries for Man City

articles.description: British and Irish Lions captain Maro Itoje says rugby is "what I do, not who I am". Outside of the arena, he is driven by faith, charity, politics and art.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Maro Itoje on faith, charity, politics and art

articles.description: All the latest reaction as Manchester City are knocked out of the Club World Cup after a 4-3 extra-time defeat by Saudi Arabian club Al-Hilal in the last 16.
articles.title: Club World Cup reaction: Man City knocked out by Al-Hilal

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your latest questions before the British Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Verstappen, Russell and Mercedes; Hamilton, Dunne, Cadillac in 2026

articles.description: Have things changed for the better in Spain and are the world champions entering a new era as they begin their pursuit of a European crown?
articles.title: Euro 2025: Spain can 'focus on winning' but is it new era?

articles.description: The Wallabies are outsiders to upset the British and Irish Lions, but former skipper James Horwill believes the hosts have the ability to go one better than he did in 2013.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: James Horwill on how the Wallabies can beat tourists

articles.description: Sergio Ramos playing in the knockout stages of a Fifa Club World Cup might not feel that noteworthy - except it is for Mexican club Monterrey.
articles.title: Sergio Ramos: How Real Madrid legend ended up taking Monterrey to Club World Cup last 16

articles.description: Gemma Grainger will take on the biggest challenge of her career when she leads Norway into the Euros. BBC Sport has been talking to the only English head coach at the tournament.
articles.title: Gemma Grainger: Meet the only English manager at Euro 2025

articles.description: Extreme weather during the Club World Cup in the United States this summer means Fifa should think about playing the men's World Cup final at 9am next year, according to an expert.
articles.title: World Cup heat: Fifa should cosider 9am start for final, says expert
